metadata.name: Happy Birthday
metadata.description:
Happy Birthday, in Carnatic* swarams, was first sung by Deepthi when she was 5 years old and she had taken her first music lessons at Raga Monsters. The teacher nurtured creativity among her students, asking them to come up with swarams for their favorite songs. She has advanced fairly well since then and has performed in a few youtube video productions. 

*Carnatic - a form of South Indian music composed of a system of raga & tala. 

Animated in FlipaClip over a period of 5 weeks. 

2560x1440 px
